author: wn.com
title: Google adopts Swiss-made voice recognition technology (26.10.2015) (Università della Svizzera italiana)
text: ( Source : Università della Svizzera italiana ) The Recurrent Neural Networks developed by the Dalle Molle Institute for Artificial Intelligence ( IDSIA , USI-SUPSI) constitute the foundations of an important technological innovation announced
